Title: Behaving Badly
Writer: Tim Garrick (screenplay by), Scott Russell (screenplay by), Ric Browde (based on the book "While I'm Dead...Feed the Dog" by)
Actors: Nat Wolff, Selena Gomez, Mary-Louise Parker, Elisabeth Shue
Plot: Teenager Rick Stevens has a crush on Nina Pennington. They form a friendship and embark on a rock n' roll journey together while Nina deals with her overbearing boyfriend, Kevin.
